name: woo-order-on-whatsapp
description: Receive orders requests direct on your phone from buttons on your woocommerce product page, cart page and after the checkout.

scripts.start-dev: npm install && composer install && ./vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set installed_paths vendor/wp-coding-standards/wpcs/ && ./vendor/bin/phpcs --config-set default_standard WordPress

author: EduardoVillao
